radiographic_examinations.findings: Opacity at the right cardiophrenic angle; no pleural effusion

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: CT scan of the chest, abdomen, and pelvis
radiographic_examinations.findings: Small right pleural effusion with associated atelectasis; no lung mass or lymphadenopathy.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: The absence of parenchymal opacities may signify resolution of a bacterial or viral pneumonia that was seen on the chest radiograph.
